mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select rownum cnum, cus_no, cus_tt, cus_once, cus_cal, cus_tan, cus_dan, cus_gee, cus_swt, cus_na, cus_col, cus_poj, cus_trs from (select * from CUISINE where cus_tt like '%'||#{findname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' order by cus_no desc ) )

select * from ( select rownum cnum, cus_no, cus_tt, cus_once, cus_cal, cus_tan, cus_dan, cus_gee, cus_swt, cus_na, cus_col, cus_poj, cus_trs from (select * from CUISINE where cus_tt like '%'||#{findname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' order by cus_no desc ) ) where cnum >= ((#{page}-1) * #{limit} +1) and cnum <= (#{page} * #{limit}) order by rownum asc
